A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: We live in a world where if a minor b-list celebrity walks into a shopping mall people lose their sh*t....and yet when the most famous hero in the universe and 3 time saviour of the galaxy walks into the base in this film.......people are just like....oh... its Luke - All the reverence Disney and RJ have for Luke and Han etc is in the marketing......in the actual films they just brush these guys aside to set up the new characters that kids will buy dolls of.
